title: Goats Are Great!
description: Why are goats great? This book informs students about goats and the products they provide. Students will learn what goats look like as well as what they eat. This nonfiction book also provides an opportunity to discuss fact and opinion. Detailed, supportive photographs and repetitive phrases support early readers.
